page.title: 15Customs:Childhood Games
page.content: When we were children in the{nursery school we played on climbing frames and dug in the sandpit.We also sang and played on the tricycles which were there. As we entered the{infants},the boys played bulldog,tag and slid cars down the playgroud while girls played hide and seek,ring a ring a roses and also "Poison".We also played on the grass and on the climbing frames.We also 'dipped' using nursery rhymes such as "Inky Pinky Donkey" and"Each,Peach, Pear,Plum". When we went into the{juniors}we played conkers and football in the Autumn,cricket in the Summer and marbles throughout the year.The girls played skipping,kingy, french skipping a made up game and also marbles.
